partners.name: Rajesh Goel
description: Rajesh Goel is a highly accomplished legal professional with a wealth of experience in Corporate and Transactional matters, Banking Finance and other related matters, Real Estate, Pharmaceutical & Arbitration matters. He is renowned having represented various corporate as also governmental clients, showcasing an exemplary proficiency in handling intricate transactions not just limited to real estate and providing invaluable legal opinions on diverse aspects of legal aspects in various fields.

Rajesh's expertise extends to skillfully negotiating complex deals, drafting meticulous real estate documents, and facilitating structured finance arrangements to ensure successful outcomes for his clients. His specialization in real estate is further underscored by his adeptness in mergers and acquisitions within the industry.

Rajesh Goel founded RGC Lawyers in 1999 which has since become a prominent player in the legal industry. With a vision to provide exceptional legal services and a focus on excellence, Rajesh laid the foundation for a firm that embodies professionalism, expertise, and a client-centric approach. Under his leadership, RGC Lawyers has thrived and earned a reputation for its breadth of experience in corporate and transactional matters, with a particular emphasis on real estate law. Rajesh's entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to delivering exceptional legal solutions have propelled the firm to success, making it a trusted destination for clients seeking top-notch legal representation in India's complex legal landscape.

partners.name: Jatin Kumar
description: As a highly esteemed Partner at RGC Lawyers, Jatin Kumar brings over 17 years of invaluable experience to the firm since joining in 2006. With a primary focus on real estate, banking and finance, general corporate related matters and client handling, Jatin has played an incredibly integral role in driving the remarkable success of our esteemed legal practice.

Jatin's expertise lies in the realm of real estate law, banking and finance law and corporate law, where he has showcased a profound understanding of the intricacies and nuances involved in various transactions. His proficiency extends to navigating complex deals and matters has earned him a reputation as a trusted legal expert in the field of law.

Moreover, Jatin's exceptional client handling skills have forged strong and enduring relationships with our esteemed clients, fostering a sense of confidence and trust in the services offered by RGC Lawyers. His unwavering commitment to achieving favorable outcomes and delivering exceptional legal counsel has been pivotal in elevating the firm's reputation for excellence.

With Jatin Kumar's wealth of experience and unwavering dedication, RGC Lawyers continues to thrive as a premier legal firm, offering top-tier legal solutions to clients seeking unparalleled representation in the dynamic landscape of real estate law. His passion for the law and his remarkable contributions to the firm have firmly established him as a key figure in our continued growth and success.

partners.name: Charu Sachdev
partners.dataText: Fourder and Managing Partner of Sachdev & Associates
description: Advocate Charu Sachdev is the Founder and Managing Partner of Sachdev & Associates, a distinguished law firm established in 2010. With over two decades of exemplary legal practice, she has built a reputation for excellence in Criminal, Civil, and Corporate law across multiple forums and jurisdictions.

Mrs. Sachdev holds a law degree from the prestigious Campus Law Centre, Faculty of Law, University of Delhi, and has also completed her C.S. (Intermediate) from the Institute of Company Secretaries of India. Her strong academic foundation, combined with extensive practical experience, enables her to provide comprehensive legal solutions tailored to her clients' diverse needs.

Prior to establishing her own practice, Advocate Sachdev honed her expertise by working with several reputed law firms and serving as part of the legal team for the Standing Counsel of Delhi Police in the Delhi High Court. This experience provided her with invaluable insights into criminal prosecution, procedural intricacies, and courtroom advocacy at the highest levels.

Her practice encompasses a wide spectrum of legal services, including criminal defense and prosecution, civil litigation, corporate advisory, and appearances before various judicial and quasi-judicial bodies. She has successfully represented clients in complex criminal trials, civil disputes, arbitration proceedings, and regulatory matters, consistently demonstrating her analytical acumen and persuasive advocacy skills.

Known for her client-centric approach and meticulous attention to detail, Ms. Sachdev combines legal expertise with strategic thinking to achieve favorable outcomes for her clients. Her deep understanding of both substantive and procedural law, coupled with her commitment to ethical practice, has made her a trusted legal advisor to individuals, businesses, and institutions alike.

partners.name: Gulshan Kr. Sachdev
description: Advocate Gulshan Kr. Sachdev is a Partner at Sachdev & Associates, bringing a unique blend of legal expertise and business acumen to the firm. He holds dual qualifications with an LL.B. degree and an MBA, enabling him to provide comprehensive legal solutions with a deep understanding of commercial and business dynamics.

With over 15 years of specialized experience in corporate legal functions, Mr. Sachdev has developed extensive expertise across multiple industries including Real Estate, Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Media & Entertainment, and Infrastructure. His diverse industry exposure allows him to navigate complex regulatory frameworks and deliver practical, business-oriented legal advice.

Mr. Sachdev's distinguished career includes serving as in-house legal counsel for several prominent corporate organizations. He has held key legal positions at renowned companies including Essel Group (Zee TV/Zee News Group), Future Capital Holdings Limited, Indiabulls Financial Services, AVIVA Life Insurance, ICICI Bank, ORIX Auto & Infrastructure Services Ltd., and Magma Leasing Limited. In these roles, he successfully managed corporate compliance, contract negotiations, regulatory matters, and strategic legal advisory functions.

His professional journey also includes valuable experience working with leading law firms and a notable association with Mr. Aman Lekhi, Additional Solicitor General of India, where he gained exposure to high-stakes litigation and constitutional matters. This diverse background has equipped him with a comprehensive understanding of both transactional and contentious legal work.
